column5: If anyone out there likes these lures, I'd reccomend stocking up! I was told that Rapala bought-out Luhr Jensen, and consequently discontinued the Krocodiles, why is beyond me.............just a heads up to my fellow fishermen and fisherwomen!!!
Anyone else had any success using these lures? They are supposed to work well for ice-fishing....
Caught smallies and walleye using them as a jigging lure late spring summer early fall on them. Favorites are still a heddon sonar or jigging rapala. Hopkins style spoons have also caught a few fish.
